code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{supabase}from'../lib/supabaseClient';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TimelineViewer=()=>{const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchTimeline();},[]);async function fetchTimeline(){const{data}=await supabase.from('timeline').select();setEvents(data||[]);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6",children:"Episode Timeline (Claude Sync)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full bg-white border",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"bg-gray-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Time"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Narration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Sound Action"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:events.map(ev=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-t",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-2",children:ev.timecode}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:ev.narration}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:ev.sound_action})]},ev.id))})]})]});};export default TimelineViewer;
